name: Fruit Quiz / Test | Fruit Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Apples give off ethylene gas which causes potatoes to sprout.
Which fruit originated in the West Indies ?
Apples are a member of the rose family.
questions.explanation:
True.

	A rose is a rose is a rose.

questions.text: What fruit is the main ingredient of guacamole?
questions.explanation:
Avocado.

	Yes it is a fruit.

questions.text: What kind of fruit are "portokali' in Greek and other languages because Portuguese merchants brought them?
What color are bananas before they turn yellow?
What color is the Granny Smith apple?
Do bananas grow up or down?
What fruit's scientific name is Vitis vinifera?
questions.explanation:
Grape.

	Would you like to swing on a vine?
